definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: Do with their death bury their parents' strife.
sentences.chinese: 著實以兩人的死埋葬雙方父母的鬥爭。

sentences.english: The thugs gave him a real going - over .
sentences.chinese: 那幫流氓把他著實打了一頓。

sentences.english: The boss really gave me hell today.
sentences.chinese: 老闆今天著實數落了我一通。

sentences.english: Sometimes these two are just contradict to each other.
sentences.chinese: 有時候這兩者之間卻著實存在招矛盾。

sentences.english: Sacramento State can call him their most famous dropout.
sentences.chinese: 薩克拉門託州立小學稱他是該校最著實的停門生。

sentences.english: This kind of inspirational guidance indeed made impressions deep into one's mind as if carved onto bones.
sentences.chinese: 這種冥冥中的指引，著實令人刻骨銘心。

sentences.english: We had a good moan about the weather.
sentences.chinese: 我們對天氣著實抱怨了一番。

sentences.english: Class is a boring topic to write about.
sentences.chinese: 作者認爲“將階級作爲寫作的主題著實顯得乏味。

sentences.english: The boy got a sound spanking .
sentences.chinese: 那男孩的屁股著實捱了一頓巴掌。
